comment: Beware of this prof. I'm willing to bet money she is posting fake ratings to boost her score. She would get frustrated at students who ask questions, contradicts herself a lot when grading, and overall not be super helpful.

You can tell Dr. Savic really cares about her students. She's approachable, responds to emails quickly, and explains concepts clearly. The class can be intense at times, but she breaks it down so it never feels overwhelming. She's one of those rare professors who actually makes learning enjoyable.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr. Savic genuinely wants her students to succeed. Her lectures are structured in a way that makes complex material easier to understand, and she's always available to help if you're struggling. It's not an easy class, but with her teaching style, it's very manageable. Highly recommend her for any engineering course.
Amazing professor. Organized, clear lectures and quick to respond when you need help. The class was challenging but fair, and she made the material make sense. Easily one of the best in ENGR.

Professor Savic is one of the best instructors I've had. Her lectures are clear, well-organized, and actually engaging. She's always responsive to questions and emails, which made the course a lot easier to keep up with. Highly recommend taking ENGR2214 with her!
Great professor! Dr. Savic delivers amazing, organized lectures and is very responsive outside of class. She made a tough subject much more manageable. Would absolutely take another class with her.

Dr. Savic was amazing in ENGR3131. Her lectures were super clear and easy to follow, and everything she covered was well-organized and relevant. She was also really responsive whenever students had questions or needed help. You can tell she genuinely cares about her students' success. Definitely one of the best professors in the department

I took her for CE 3202 and Dr. Savic is hands-down one of the best instructors I've ever had. Her passion for the subject is contagious, and they go above and beyond to make sure every student feels seen and supported. Lectures are engaging, organized, and often sprinkled with humor or real-world examples. I love her.

Come on guys! Don't tell lies. She is one of the rare professors who makes you feel excited to learn. Professor Savic brings energy, clarity, and compassion to every lecture. Her teaching style is interactive and supportive, and genuinely root for every student to succeed. Easily one of the best educational experiences I've ever had.

Taking a class with Professor Savic was a game-changer. She is not just a great teacher—she is a mentor. She explains complex concepts clearly and is always willing to help outside of class. The environment she creates is respectful, challenging, and inclusive. I learned more than I ever expected.

I had amazing experience. Depends on what type of student you are. For bad students she is tough, for good students she is awesome… Like her. Always accessible, polite, kind and she cares… If you need easy A without knowledge don't take her.

Take her and you will know is the only way to know! she was a horrible professor when I took her and I can not believe student have to tolerate her just because we need the credits, very disrespectful to students, I can not believe she has so many good reviews when we all know that she is a terrible teachr and has no vocation at all.
rating_tags: Lecture heavy--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: I had amazing experience with Dr. Savic.She is so far the best Professor I had throughout the college!

I had an excellent experience taking Professor Savic. She expects that you put in effort and attend class, but this is the key to success in any class. Claiming there to be a language barrier is a lousy excuse for doing poorly in her class. She makes herself available outside of class beyond office hours as she wants to see her students succeed.

Had her for Lab. She puts you in groups for the lab report. She calls on random names for lab experiments to engage everyone in the lab. As long as you show up, and are ready to participate, the lab is very easy.
She is teaching concrete this term. I adore her. Amazing lectures, good examples, challenging exams. Always accessible.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I like Dr. Savic. She is focused on the sections which we need after graduation. Her office is always full, but still she pays attentiontion on all of us. She is great.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: So far the best professor at KSU!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: This professor will judge you if you ask questions and laugh at your face. Her accent is pretty tough to understand. She grades harshly, almost like she wants you to fail. She says very discouraging things to students in class and will call you out in front of everyone. I do not recommend taking her.

Very nice lady but one of the worst professors i've ever had. i dread going to class every time because she CANNOT teach in a way anyone understands. the entire class is left so confused and partly due to language barrier. avoid at all costs. especially if you are civil major. she teaches only slides from textbook without any of her own thoughts.

Dr. Savic goes through problems in class and gives you enough practice to be prepared for exams. She is great and very accessible and hosts office hours which are always helpful. She may seem intimidating at first but she is one of the best professors I've had! She really teaches you to be self sufficient.

Dr. Savic was an extremely knowledgeable teacher. She was very clear and concise. I really enjoyed how she connected the course to Real life situations. She also made sure every student understood the concepts before she moved onto the next one. She took the time to individually help everyone and I would definitely take her again.

Dr. Savic is one of those professors you either love or you hate, and I think it boils down to what kind of student you are. You are expected to remember what you learned in prereq's. She will make her disappointment known if you don't. However, if you show up and know the material, she will love you and you will enjoy her class.

I took her for Statics and Strength of Materials. She helped me a lot. I am tutoring both courses now. My friends from Georgia Tech compared my exams with theirs, mine were tougher. I am so thankful, she prepared me for all other courses. Thank you our Queen!
The most knowledgable person in the CE Department. Very strong personality but at the same time the most caring person I ever met.
Absolutely amazing!
I had final exam today. She is the best Teacher at the university. If you want to know take her, otherwise PASS!

I felt that whenever we asked questions the teacher seemed annoyed Instead of helpful responses her body language suggested we shouldn't speak up When a classmate made a mistake she laughed This attitude reflected poorly on our school teachers should model respect We needed someone who inspired us to ask questions without fear of jdgemnt avoid her

She is a very new teacher barely knows how to explain the topics does not take her time to explain anything and have a horrible attitude she seems BIPOLAR and nobody can be at her level she is too proud of herself and very disrespectful to students call them names in front of everyone does not follow KSU policies, Ma'am this is not in SERBIA!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: She has a thick accent and may look mean at first but she's a great professor that wants to see you succeed. She gives lots of practice tests that are similar so the actual test and grades them pretty fair. Just put your work and you'll do fine. Take her!!
The best Professor at KSU. Hard accent, but amazing teacher. She combined some real life examples with the lectures. Graded exam same day. If you want to learn take her.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Whole term I was fighting with my demons. She was willing to listen offering the help. Her way of teaching was to prepare you to be more independent. Lecture very well explained with couple of problems, and she was checking in the class how well we understood giving us a problem to solve on our own.
For me the best professor so far. Always reachable, office hours are great, exams are tough but she explained the topic excellent. Will take her for strength of materials in fall.

You will learn very little in her Class. You will have to teach yourself everything. Test are not super hard and she gives multiple study guides for every test. The test are pretty similar to the study Guide.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class
